main.name: Taylor Bakow
main.description: I'm passionate about using new technologies to innovate and architect business solutions
main.bio: Currently pursuing a Masters of Information Systems Management (MISM) degree at Brigham Young University. Interested in software development, blockchain, cybersecurity, and data analytics/machine learning. Aside from tech, I love golfing, hiking, running, and playing just about any sport. I also enjoy playing guitar, reading, eating food, and watching a good movie/TV show.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message and lets get in touch!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my favorite technologies to work with.

education.school: Brigham Young University - Marriott School of Business

work.title: Software Developer and Technology Consultant
work.description: Eide Bailly is a top accounting and business advisory firm. I currently work in their technology consulting branch as a Software Developer and Consultant. As a developer I help build custom applications using React.js on the front-end and C# on the back-end. We build custom Rest APIs and GraphQL endpoints with C# hosted on Azure. I have also participated in several Salesforce development projects where I write back-end code using Apex (Java) with SOQL (Salesforce's database query language) and front-end code using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Salesforce Aura and Lightning Web Components to create features and improve functionality in the Salesforce platform for our clients.

work.title: Enterprise Services Project Manager
work.description: Mozenda is a Provo based software company that has become a market leader in web data scraping. Web scraping is the process by which a person will write scripts programatically to automate the extraction of information from a website. Through Mozenda's software, web data can be scraped, parsed, cleaned, and shipped to clients in an automated process. Web-scraped data is extremely valuable for business strategy, marketing, analytics, and many other things. During my time at Mozenda I was tasked with both helping Mozenda's largest enterprise clients succeed in their data projects and carrying out the actual projects themselves for other clients.

work.title: Front End Web Developer
work.description: I had the opportunity to intern with PhraseWorthy, a Provo based company that focuses on text analytics. PhraseWorthy uses linguistic algorithms and text analytics to help companies, writers, and journalists come up with phrases, taglines, brand-names, etc. As an intern I was tasked with doing front-end web development to improve website features and functions as well as make the website responsive to mobile devices.

projects.title: Zillow Machine Learning
projects.category: Machine Learning Algorithm For Predicting Housing Prices In Utah

projects.title: WaterWell Consultants Website
projects.category: Freelance website and database for an Idaho based agriculture company. Built with React.js and a headless wordpress backend for a CMS.

projects.title: NBA GOAT Predictor
projects.category: Submitted for a case competition in 2018. Our team used data analytics to create a model for predicting how NBA players compare to one another. 2nd place finish in the Wolf Company annual case competition.

projects.title: Opioid Crisis Database Website
projects.category: Opioid Awareness Project. This was submitted as a final project for a IS multi-class project

projects.title: Qwixx Scoresheet
projects.category: An interactive web interface to save paper on one of our family's favorite games.
